title: The year news gets personalized (seriously)
description: Every year since approximately the invention of the iPad, someone predicts that this — finally! — will be the year of personalization. And usually that means: “We’ll use cookies to figure out you like politics, and put more politics articles at the top of your feed.” For the last decade, our industry has viewed personalization...
